section1.title: What is fon4food?
section1.subtitle: fon4food is a platform that supports the collaboration of vendors and suppliers to deliver essential goods ordered by phone to the customer's doorstep.
section1.text1: Here you can find participating vendors who are currently offering this service in your area:

section2.title: How it works
section2.step1-text1: A list of participating vendors currently offering this service can be downloaded
section2.step1-text2: .  This information is published in local newspapers so it is accessible for people who don't use the internet.
section2.step2-text: The customer finds his preferred vendor along with phone number, times of order acceptance, and delivery fees.  He then calls the vendor to place his order.
section2.step3-text: The vendor puts together the delivery.  If necessary he calls the customer again to clarify any upcoming questions.  The vendor then encloses the invoice with the delivery.
section2.step4-text: The vendor creates a new delivery record in the system and assigns it to one of his suppliers.
section2.step5-text: The supplier is notified about the delivery and confirms it.  The vendor has an overview about the current delivery situation and can react fast.
section2.step6-text: At the beginning of the agreed delivery time window, the supplier collects the delivery from the supplier and confirms this in the system.
section2.step7-text: The supplier puts the delivery in front of the customer's door and ensures that the customer takes it.
section2.step8-text: At the end of his delivery tour the supplier brings the undeliverable deliveries back to the vendor.
section2.step9-text: The customer pays the invoice e.g. by telephone or direct debit directly to the vendor.
section2.step10-text: For all delivered and paid shipments as well as for necessary returns, the vendor pays the amounts agreed upon via the platform to the supplier.
